channel.title: Argh! Please help.. basic coding!
channel.description: Im using the project ksam base, and it has random pvp drops. I have another server and i want to replace the random pvp drops with normal drops. It definately isnt in the code where they die and i cant find the code controlling them dropping all their items anywhere!! please help!!
